# Calendar Table {.normal_slide}
```{}

  DATE(2020, 01, 01),
  DATE(2020, 12, 31))
```
```{}
cal_table = CALENDAR(
  DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) - 1, 01, 01),
  DATE(YEAR(TODAY()) - 1, 12, 31))
```
```{}
cal_table = CALENDAR(
  MIN(orders_small[date]),
  MAX(orders_small[date]))
```
